name: Egypt 1156 B.C.: Tomb of the Pharaoh
name_original: Egypt 1156 B.C.: Tomb of the Pharaoh
description:
Egypt 1156 B.C.: Tomb of the Pharaoh is an educational adventure game developed by Canal+ Multimedia and Cryo Interactive Entertainment. It came out on 01-01-1997. Cryo Interactive Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Egypt 1156 B.C.: Tomb of the Pharaoh is available on PC.
